name: The Gun Show
description:
The Gun Show is a super simple game about an old-timey bodybuilder. Click the right pose that the audience shouts out to score points. Strike as many correct poses as you can in 60 seconds.

Made in 4 hours for Trijam 137 - the theme was "Big Guns". All gameplay and art made by me for this jam. The music was made by me for a previous project. The sound effects are from various royalty-free sources.

Best played in your browser, or if that doesn't work, download the game with the link below (to play: download the ZIP, extract the files, then run the file called "TheGunShow").
